text: Goodnight Goodnight or Goodnight and Goodnight may refer to: In music: * "Goodnight Goodnight" (Hot Hot Heat song), 2005 * "Goodnight Goodnight" (Maroon 5 song), 2008 In taxonomy: *The publications and described taxa of zoologist Clarence J. Goodnight and Marie L. Goodnight
title: Goodnight Goodnight
